attributes.action: remove and ban implementing in the future all of the absurd health and safety regualtions that have been introduced in the last few years and force people to accept that accidents happen that are no one's fault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Like making kids wear goggles when they're playing conkers.Or banning hugs as 'harassment'.Or cutting down crab apple trees in case an apple hits someone on the head.

People need to realise that things happen that are both incredibly insignificant and nobody's responsibility,just the result of bad luck.Your own health in a public space is your responsibility.
